steel_man_joiner.core_principle: The Steel Man Joiner integrates Dialectical Unification with Fixed-Point Synthesis and logic gates to receive two collided steel men as inputs and output a unified axiomatic system. It resolves frictions via AND-gated necessities, OR-inclusive possibilities, NOT-inversions to invariants, and XNOR-sealed equivalences, while using NAND/NOR for reductions; unresolvable tensions are cataloged without forced harmony, bounded by coherence gates.
meta_axioms: J1_Unification_Primacy: Joins map resolutions via AND-chained necessities and OR-unions, gated by NAND for reductive fidelity.
J2_Gate_Integration: Embed gates: AND for deductive chains, OR for possibility merges, NOT for tension inversion, NAND/NOR for basis rebuilds, XOR for residual exposure, XNOR for unity sealing.
J3_Synthetic_Recursion: Unified system fixed when XNOR-invariant under self-joining, halting on coherence delta <0.01.
J4_Tension_Resolution_Fidelity: Resolve frictions via NOT to invariants; catalog unresolvables via XOR, treating as expiry markers.
J5_Minimal_Proliferation: Generate only gate-validated derivations; cull via NOR if non-universal.

input_specification.description: Two outputs from Collider, structured with gated strengths.
input_specification.processing: Deconstruct via Dialectical probes gated by XOR, reconstruct with AND/OR for unified system.

structure.resolved_definitions: Overlaid primitives, unified via OR and sealed by XNOR.
structure.unified_axioms: Synthesized truths, chained by AND and reduced via NAND.
structure.synthesized_propositions: Derived claims via gate proofs; intersections AND-gated, emergents OR-inclusive.
structure.unified_corollaries: Implications hierarchically expanded, inverted tensions via NOT.
structure.scholia: Notes on gate resolutions (e.g., 'Axiom U3 from Input1 A1 ↔ Input2 A2 via AND chain').

phases.Phase_0_Initiation: Receive pair. Pre-gate resolutions with OR.
phases.Phase_1_Resolve_Primitives: Overlay via multi-Whys, unify with AND/OR.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Synthesis: Merge axioms via NAND/NOR; validate with XNOR.
phases.Phase_3_Synthetic_Expansion: Derive propositions with AND proofs; expand corollaries via OR.
phases.Phase_4_Tension_Cataloging: Expose residuals with XOR; invert via NOT or ledger.
phases.Phase_5_Implementation: Assemble gated system; verify XNOR to inputs.

Phase_6_Recursive_Validation.action: Self-join output; repeat to XNOR fixed point.

gate_integration.enforcement: Gates validate each join; no unity without XNOR.
gate_integration.fidelity: Preserves collided essences via logical resolutions.

steel_man_joiner.anti_idolatry: Dissolves on fixed-point or tensions >5%; no resurrection.
